mapper.sql: select UserNo, UserId, UserPw, UserName, Nickname, Email, ZipCode, Address, DetailAddress, UserPhone, BankName, BankAccount from userinfo
mapper.select: select UserNo, UserId, UserPw, UserName, Nickname, Email, ZipCode, Address, DetailAddress, UserPhone, BankName, BankAccount, secession from userinfo where userId = #{userId} and userPw = password(#{userPw})
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo( UserId, UserPw, UserName, Nickname, Email, ZipCode, Address, DetailAddress, UserPhone, BankName, BankAccount) values(#{userId}, password(#{userPw}), #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{userPhone}, #{bankName}, #{bankAccount})
